_meanings:
(Either used with
nouns to form adverbial compounds,
or as a prefix to verbs and verbal 
derivatives, or as a separable 
preposition with <ab>acc.</ab> and regarded as a  
{#karmapravacanIya#})

{@--3@} After,
in consequence of, being indicated by;
{#japamanu prAvarzat#} <ls>P. II. 3. 8</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> ( 
{#hetuBUtajapopalakzitaM varzaRaM#}); so {#vfkzamanu vidyotate vidyut#}.

{@--5@} Inferior or 
subordinate to ({#hIne#}); {#mitralABamanu#} 
{#lABasaMpadaH#} <ls>Ki. 13. 52</ls> inferior, lower in
value or importance; {#anu hariM surAH#} = 
{#harerhInAH#} <ls>P. I. 4. 86</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>

{@--6@} In a 
particular relation or state ({#itTaMBUtAKyAne#}
{#prakAraviSezanirUpaRe#}); {#Bakto vizRumanu#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
({#vizRoritTaMBUtaH, BaktiviSezayuktaH#}) an 
ardent devotee of Viṣṇu; {#yastvAM dvezwi sa#}
{#mAM dvezwi yastvAmanu sa mAmanu#} <ls>Rām.</ls> 
favourably inclined or devoted to.

{@--10@} In orderly succession, according
to; {#anukramaM#} in regular order;  
{#anujyezWaM#} = {#jyezWasyAnupUrvyeRa#} in order of 
seniority; {#°pUrvaM; anurUpaM#} = {#rUpasya yogyaM#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
